actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill entitled the "Fort Totten National Historic Site Act".
short_title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act

summary.text: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the lands for and establish the Fort Totten National Historic Site, North Dakota. Requires the Secretary to submit a general management plan for such Site within two years to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act
A bill entitled the "Fort Totten National Historic Site Act".
